name: Halloween Command
description:
This was a quick game I created in the spirit of Halloween. I was inspired by the Unity Halloween Asset Store sale and remembering how cool it was to watch Jason Weimann make a fun Halloween game the other year. I have always wanted to try that. So here is my Game made in approximately 5 business days. Hope you all enjoy. 

The controls are nice and easy. You click on the screen to launch your fireworks to blow up the falling Jack-O-Lanterns. If the kids have placed the rockets one will fire to blow up them up.  The game ends when you lose all your kids.
